mapper.update: update movieshowing set name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, image = #{image,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rating = #{rating,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_imax = #{isImax,jdbcType=BIT}, is_3d = #{is3d,jdbcType=BIT}, directors = #{directors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, actors = #{actors,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type = #{type,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, content = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, runTime = #{runtime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, id_maoyan = #{idMaoyan,jdbcType=INTEGER}, id_mtime = #{idMtime,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, name, image, rating, is_imax, is_3d, directors, actors, type, content, runTime, id_maoyan, id_mtime from movieshowing where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
